Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran's 67 off 40 balls helped West Indies clinch a two-wicket victory
Tilak Varma's 51 not out kept India's hopes alive
Hardik Pandya took 3 wickets for India
Akeal Hosein, Alzarri Joseph, and Romario Shepherd took two wickets each for West Indies
Hosein and Joseph combined for 26 runs to secure victory with 7 balls to spare
Post-Match Reflections: Pandya acknowledged poor batting performance and conceded they were not good enough to reach 160+
Pooran expressed satisfaction with his performance and focus on smart batting
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies won the second T20I in Providence
The third T20 will be held at the same venue on Tuesday
